title: Hotel Erotica
overview: Hotel Erotica is a softcore porn anthology television show that broadcast on the Cinemax cable television channel during its Skinemax late-night block.The show usually involved the hotel's proprietor reading a letter from a former guest talking about their adventure at the hotel. The episode would then be a flashback of the guest coming to the hotel and falling in love with someone. The hotel proprietor was initially Chloe Wilson in the first season. In the second season it was Jenny.Many notable softcore and hardcore porn stars appeared on the show, such as Beverly Lynne, Monique Parent, Angela Davies, Jenna Jameson, Ron Jeremy, and former WWE wrestler Candice Michelle.
